author: cmpilato
msg: Add version checking code and a nice error message for folks that
don't have the Subversion Python bindings installed.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Add outcome of discussion with Branko
and Madan on WC -> WC copying.

author: lgo
msg: In the Windows buildsystem, don't create the serf project if openssl can't be
(__init__): extracted check whether serf is available in a separate
(_find_serf): test if both serf and openssl directories are available
checking for serf, also check for openssl.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Make it easier to build ra_serf on Windows:
(gen_install_targets): Do not build neon if using serf and vice versa.
(get_win_libs): Add serf library and make neon optional.
(write_neon_project_file): If serf is specified, don't write a neon project.
(_find_neon): set neon_lib to None if we don't have neon.
(ra-libs): Add ra_serf as an explicit dependency.
